commit.message:
Extract Lit templates support to a separate module

Fixes #9038
Add lit template dependency to ITs.
Correct pom file and add template modules to bom

beforeCommit.message: Add lit template dependency to ITs.

afterCommit.message: Correct pom file and add template modules to bom

commit.message: AVoid cross module links in javadocs

nodes.bodyText: How can this work - polymer template is in a module that should not be visible
Do not forget to remove this deprecated code someday.
